title: Cookie Jar (for Android Wear)
summary: Nom nom nom! A delicious cookie watch face for your Android Wear device.
description: Nom nom nom! A delicious cookie watch face for your Android Wear device.5 yummy cookies to choose from:• Chocolate Chip• Double Chocolate• White Chocolate Chip• Orio• Fruit CentreDesigned for both circular and square screens! And every graphic is rendered for the screen resolution and density - so everything looks sharp and crisp.Note: A glass of milk is not included! Caution: Extreme cookie cravings have been reported by users. Beware!Instructions-------------After installation, long press your Android Wear homescreen, you'll see a list of available watch faces. Swipe to your desired cookie and enjoy! It may take anywhere from 5 to 10 minutes for the watch face to show up on device.Compatible with Android Wear 5.0 on the following watches: Moto360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatch, and more.Feedback?-------------We'd love to hear what you think! Shoot us an email at info@watchfuldesign.com
descriptionHTML:
Nom nom nom! A delicious cookie watch face for your Android Wear device.

5 yummy cookies to choose from:
• Chocolate Chip
• Double Chocolate
• White Chocolate Chip
• Orio
• Fruit Centre

Designed for both circular and square screens! And every graphic is rendered for the screen resolution and density - so everything looks sharp and crisp.

Note: A glass of milk is not included!
Caution: Extreme cookie cravings have been reported by users. Beware!

Instructions
-------------
After installation, long press your Android Wear homescreen, you'll see a list of available watch faces. Swipe to your desired cookie and enjoy! It may take anywhere from 5 to 10 minutes for the watch face to show up on device.

Compatible with Android Wear 5.0 on the following watches: Moto360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatch, and more.


Feedback?
-------------
We'd love to hear what you think! Shoot us an email at info@watchfuldesign.com
comments: Love the watchface Just a suggestion, could you make the app eat the cookie when you tap the watch?
This is so amazing!! My favourite watch face EVER.
Really cool The only thing that could make it better is a second hand
